content.raw:
I have seen it only on the trace, it looked like the robot hit the wall and slight to the right. I was using ROBOTIKA\_X2\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1. I would see similar glitch on Cave 1 near the entrance, but the robot made couple circles where so it is a bit strange \(this showed on the way back\) … [https://youtu.be/4uTuY5mygFU?t=289](https://youtu.be/4uTuY5mygFU?t=289)

I have seen similar “side motion” in Cave 3 … could be some problem in our algorithm. I will add more notes after log analysis, thanks m.
content.html:
I have seen it only on the trace, it looked like the robot hit the wall and slight to the right. I was using ROBOTIKA_X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1. I would see similar glitch on Cave 1 near the entrance, but the robot made couple circles where so it is a bit strange (this showed on the way back) … https://youtu.be/4uTuY5mygFU?t=289

I have seen similar “side motion” in Cave 3 … could be some problem in our algorithm. I will add more notes after log analysis, thanks m.
